document_data.name: Midnight Men
document_data.mainbody: The '''Midnight Men''' were a mercenary company in the [[Stonelands]].
document_data.History: The Midnight Men earned some notoriety from [[Waterdeep]] to [[Thay]]. They retired around [[1338 DR]]. However in [[1358 DR]], some unknown force hunted the former members of the Midnight Men and turned them into [[undead]].
